changelog:
Cinemax v1.4.2 update includes:
- Much much faster syncing speed (this is achieved by changing the database online so, if you want to transfer the saved titles you have online you must sync the items to local bookmark first, it's a bit technical but it is what it is)
- Soundtrack section is back working
- UI fix
- Bug fix and general quality of life update
Minimum Android version required to run the app: 5.0 or Lollipop or up
